data.title: For the Public
data.meta_description: Join us for public lectures and events with artists and experts as well as special programs for local businesses, summer camps for children, educational opportunities for adults and executive training.
data.text:
Conflict Dynamics Profile

The CDP shows trainers, coaches and consultants the path to strong conflict-resolution skills by building self-awareness and improving conflict-management skills.

Entrepreneurial Mindset Profile

The EMP is a cutting-edge assessment tool that examines the skills and capabilities needed for this new way of operating. The EMP helps corporate leaders, students and entrepreneurs assess the degree to which they are utilizing an “entrepreneurial mindset” and provides resources to leverage that competitive edge.

Leadership Development Institute

The LDI at Eckerd College was founded in 1980 to help individuals, teams and organizations achieve their leadership potential. From a comprehensive multiweek leadership institute for executive teams to a one-day session to help managers master the challenges of workplace conflict, LDI provides coaching and diagnostic services that identify company roadblocks and assist in the attainment of organizational goals.

Mediation Training Institute

MTI is the foremost provider of workplace conflict resolution and mediation training.

Nielsen Center for the Liberal Arts
